testcases.name: listdevices
testcases.description: Get list of available devices in the controller

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of remain Battery of Aoetec-DoorWindowSensor (unit %)

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of REPORT_GROUP for verifying value.

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set ASSOCIATION REPORT_GROUP, this case is our controller, those notification will be sent whenever door/window open/close

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of REPORT_GROUP for verifying value which we set before

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set ASSOCIATION REPORT_GROUP, this case is Z-wave Led, those notification will be sent to associated device whenever door/window open/close .

testcases.name: readspec_takeaction
testcases.description: Wait 60s to test open/close door notification to on/off Z-wave Led.

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Remove associated Z-wave Led from REPORT_GROUP.

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Verify associated Z-wave Led after removing.

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set value 00 to enable binary report which will be sent to our controller.

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set value FF to disable binary report which will be sent to our controller.
